{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sitecom |model=WLR-7100 |revision=v1 - 001 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00E0M9MDU;GB;, B00HC7KX7O;GB; |price=199 |est_release_date=06/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=Europe only |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-WBR7100AC |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR1022;AR1022-AL1A; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR1022;AR1022-AL1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9882 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless AC1200 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X7}}
[http://www.sitecom.com/en/wi-fi-router-x7-ac1200/wlr-7100/p/1619 Product page]
[http://www.sitecom.com/lu/persbericht-detail/231/2625 ''Sitecom releases 802.11ac product range'' - '''Sitecom''' press release from June 2013]
*[[Sitecom WLR-7100]] v1 - SOC AR1022 (ar71xx) [https://wiki.commotionwireless.net/doku.php/development_resources/router/hardware_compatibility_list comp. list] :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, USB: 1x USB 2.0 :WLAN: AR1022 (int. 2.4GHz) + QCA9882 (5GHz) :802.11a/b/g/n/ac, GbE 4x LAN + 1x WAN
===See also=== *[[Sitecom WLA-3100]] - Wireless AC600 Dual-Band USB 2.0 Wi-Fi Adapter *[[Sitecom WLR-5002]] - Wireless AC750 Gigabit Dual-Band Router [http://www.madshrimps.be/vbulletin/f22/sitecom-extends-802-11ac-product-line-ac750-wi-fi-router-ac600-wi-fi-adapter-115742/ PR] *[[Sitecom WLR-6100]] - Wireless N900 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X6 *[[Sitecom WLA-6100]] - Wireless N900 Dual-Band USB 2.0 Wi-Fi Adapter *[[Sitecom WLR-7100]] - Wireless AC1200 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X7 *[[Sitecom WLA-7100]] - Wireless AC1200 Dual-Band USB 3.0 Wi-Fi Adapter *[[Sitecom WLR-8100]] - Wireless AC1750 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X8
